summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning amending Sections 23.30.010, 23.45.004 and 23.45.006 of the Seattle Municipal Code to change the requirements for the development of multifamily structures; repealing Section 23.45.006.5 through 23.45.046 and adding new Sections 23.45.008 through 23.45.018 to consolidate development standards for building in all Lowrise Multifamily Zones.
